extendedInfo.description: Finding the Mass time in nearby churches is easy now. This app finds the location using GPS and displays the nearby churches and Mass times with the help of masstimes.org website. Just start the application and results will be displayed.Note This app tested for North America and EUROPE regions.

reviews.title: Used to work better
reviews.comment: When the webpage updated it no longer can be sorted by mass by day. Since the point of the site is getting mass times to get to mass that is a big draw back.
reviews.author: Dot Hoppe

reviews.title: Not complete.
reviews.comment: When choosing a city, the result comes with other cities mixed in for a particular day. Also, only a small amount of churches are listed. My particlar church,  although being quite large, is not listed. Not all mass times are listed. I like that we can choose any particular day of the week. The addresses and phone numbers checked are so far all accurate. It would be nice if there would be a button or a link to the source for us to add our own churches to the list with updated information.
reviews.author: Vonita Esse

reviews.title: Not an app...
reviews.comment: It\'s exactly like the website. Which sucks on a smartphone. If I wanted the website on my phone, I would just plug it into the browser. This is useless for any screen that isn\'t a laptop....
reviews.author: Adele C. Smith

reviews.title: Not a real app
reviews.comment: Great on a laptop,  not for smartphone.  Displays a web page,  not even a mobile web page.  Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: John Vicini

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This is very useful and helps us a lot!
reviews.author: Peter Nguyen

reviews.title: Good idea but needs alot of work
reviews.comment: Having used the website, this app looks exactly what you can find online. Thought the app would be more streamlined and convenient to use while on the go. Uninstalling it for now until they redesign something much better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works, but not well
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t play so well with the gps, and gets really confused when launched or hidden. And basically it\'s just a frame for their website, complete with embedded google maps and weird scrolling and framing issues. But it gets the job done. And is a wonderful service to offer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Difficult to read
reviews.comment: Map is totally unlegible. Times are difficult to read. Needs work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doug
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on Thunderbolt Android.  Formatting  and signal drop out problems. Needs lot more work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not pretty, but it works.
reviews.comment: There are some formatting problems with the Web Page. However, when you\'re in a strange city looking for a Mass, you just need functionality.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: I can\'t pull up mass times. Might as well try and use the website (which is already difficult to navigate) through the browser.
reviews.author: Laura Walker

reviews.comment: It would be very helpful but it hangs up constantly then crashes.
reviews.author: Carla Dalton

reviews.title: Pity
reviews.comment: Does not work outside USA, Pity...
reviews.author: An Sapphire Gael
